sentence: My congress critter, Scott Perry, has military experience at least with the reserves.

sentence: More than two dozen GOP representatives joined the letter, including House Freedom Caucus Chairman Scott Perry of Pennsylvania, Lauren Boebert of Colorado, Andy Biggs of Arizona, Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, Louie Gohmert of Texas, Thomas Massie of Kentucky and Brian Mast of Florida.

title: Families speak out about having to swear off Disney over its swing to left and woke policies
